author: leif
msg: Rework the way normal debug messages are displayed so that the user is not hit
with stack traces in the debug output even when Fortress is starting normally.

author: leif
msg: Make it possible to control whether or not debug output of the worker threads
can be configured from the log config file.  This can be necessary to track down
problems in the threads.  Worker output can be disabled as it has its own channel.

author: leif
msg: Fix line feeds.  No other changes.

author: mcconnell
msg: Latest news on the consolidated Merlin system.
